name: FICSIT Checkmark™
description:
The FICSIT Checkmark™ is a way for pioneers to truly distinguish themselves as Verified pioneers. It's an opt-in, paid subscription that adds an orange checkmark to your player ID in online sessions and offers no other beneficial features. 

The goal of the FICSIT Checkmark™ is to increase trust in FICSIT Inc. by providing a visual signifier that notable pioneers are the real deal and not just impostors or parody pioneers that can’t afford the coupons.  

The FICSIT Checkmark™ will only be visible in online sessions for other pioneers to witness your certification status within FICSIT. The knowledge of purchase is its own reward.

name: Resource Sink Bonus Program
description: This Build Gun software upgrade adds a new tab to the Build Menu: The Customizer. From here pioneers have access to the Color section, as well as Material and Pattern options, which can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.

name: Oil Processing

name: Basic Steel Production
description: Awesome new products will become available in the AWESOME Shop upon obtaining this Milestone.

name: FICSIT Blueprints
description: This Build Gun software upgrade adds the Blueprint tab to the Build Menu. From the Blueprint tab, pioneers are able to access and organize the Blueprints created with the Blueprint Designer.
